00033 #define reps 1800
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * List of functions.  Should be helpful in finding information from GPS
00037  */
00038 
00039 void accuracyTest(GPS * gps) {
00040         ofstream fout("Accuracy Testing.txt"); // to take GPS readings for testing
00041         fout.precision(12);
00042 
00043         fout << " Simulate for " << reps << " cycles " << endl << endl;
00044 
00045         mrpt::system::sleep(1000);
00046         double totalSum = 0;
00047         double stability = 0;
00048         double distance;
00049 
00050         double gpsAccuracyArray[reps];
00051         double preLat = gps->GetGpsLatitude();
00052         double preLon = gps->GetGpsLongitude();
00053         for (int i = 0; i < reps; i++) {
00054                 mrpt::system::sleep(1000);
00055                 gps->doGPSProcess();
00056                 fout.precision(14);
00057                 distance = gps->GetDistanceToWaypoint(preLat, preLon);
00058 
00059                 // tests if no GPS data was returned or if returned too large error
00060                 if (distance == 0.0 || distance > 1) {
00061                         ++stability;
00062                         fout << " BAD READING " << endl;
00063                 }
00064                 else {
00065                         totalSum += gpsAccuracyArray[i] = distance;
00066                         fout << "Distance = " << gpsAccuracyArray[i] << endl;
00067 
00068                 }
00069 
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073                 preLat = gps->GetGpsLatitude();
00074                 preLon = gps->GetGpsLongitude();
00075         }
00076         fout << endl << "Accuracy for " << (reps) << " points taken:       " << totalSum/(reps-stability) << " meters." << endl;
00077 
00078         fout << "And " << stability << " readings lost" << endl;
00079 
00080         fout.close();
00081 }
00082 
00083 int main() {
00084 
00085         GPS gps;
00086         CConfigFile * config = new CConfigFile("GPS.ini");
00087         gps.initialize(config);
00088 
00089         accuracyTest(&gps);
00090 
00091         return 0;
00092 }
